N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 118.6 - Seed standards

State Regulations

Representative samples of seed shall meet the following
general standards: Foundation

Certified

Pure seed
(minimum........................................................................ 99.0%
99.0%

(maximum........................................................................ 0.1%
1.0%

(maximum....................................................................... 0.1%
0.2%
Weed seeds
(maximum........................................................................ 0.1%
0.2%
Germination quick
(minimum........................................................................ 35.0%
35.0%
Total germination and hard seed
(minimum........................................................................ 70.0%
70.0%
